document.discussion_title: UI Health System and Wellmark to create new health insurance offering | The Loop
document.topic_text: April 25, 2016 UI Health System and Wellmark to create new health insurance offering Wellmark and University of Iowa Health System, through the University of Iowa Health Alliance, have collaborated to create a new health insurance offering. This new health insurance venture, will be known as Wellmark Synergy Health and use the assets of both organizations to continue creating more affordable health insurance options for Iowans. The UI Health Alliance will bring its strength as a physician, ARNP, PA, and hospital provider network to this endeavor, while Wellmark will contribute its recognized strength in designing and offering health insurance products that meet the needs of diverse individuals and companies. UI Health Care is part of the UI Health Alliance. Other UI Health Alliance participating providers are located in Johnson, Linn, Scott, and Des Moines counties. Leadership looks forward to sharing more details about this exciting and innovative partnership in the coming months, with a goal of offering this new product to Iowans in fall 2016.
